text: Harz is a rural district in Saxony-Anhalt, Germany named after the highland area also called harz. It is home to the highest point in the region: the Brocken. == History == The district was made by joining the old districts of Halberstadt, Wernigerode and Quedlinburg as well as the city of Falkenstein (from the district of Aschersleben-Staßfurt). This was part of the reform of all districts in 2007. ==Towns and municipalities== Free towns Free municipalities # Elbingerode # Falkenstein # Halberstadt # Quedlinburg # Wernigerode # Huy Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften * 1.
